messages.content: I will give you some context for further prompts, this is data about Bilal Ghalib, the cofounder of Bloom. It contains some assessment data, answers to some questions, and 360 feedback reports from colleagues, let me know and I'll send you part one. Tell me if this is how I can add context and say I'm ready for part two and I'll send that

Thank you for providing context. You can definitely add context in this manner. I'm ready for part one of the data about Bilal Ghalib, the cofounder of Bloom. Please provide the assessment data, answers to questions, and 360 feedback reports from colleagues.

This is the last bit of context, are you ready? 
Bilal answers questions about challenges and needs: What are your top three personal and professional learning goals at this stage in your career?
